mapper.sql: FROM xf_advertise_home h left JOIN xf_design_resources r on h.design_id = r.id left JOIN js_sys_user u on u.user_code = h.create_id where u.province=#{province} and u.city=#{city} ORDER BY h.seq desc LIMIT #{pageNo},1
mapper.select: SELECT h.id, r.id AS designId, h.pic AS pic, h.title AS title, h.company AS company
SELECT id,pic,design_id as designId FROM xf_business_center WHERE del_flag=0
